data.title: How to Contest B Heaven With Mail ZERO/POINT
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective knife lineup you can use to scan and disable all Defenders contesting B Heaven.

data.title: Bottom Mid to Top Mid FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for Top Mid to get an enemy out of the box corner or kill them if they stay there.

data.title: A Main to A Rafters ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Rafters from A Main.

data.title: A Main to A Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Site default plant spot.

data.title: A Main to A Site ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Site.
